p: To extract proteins for antioxidant enzyme analysis, 200 mg of leaf samples was flash-frozen in liquid nitrogen and homogenized in 10 ml of Tris-HCl buffer (pH 7.5, 0.1 M). The homogenate was centrifuged at 13,000 r/min for 15 min at 4Â°C and supernatants collected to determine CAT, POD, and PPO activities using established protocols described in Sudhakar et al. (2001).
